data.event: The county was created in December 1835 and organized in 1836.
The county was created in December 1835 and organized in 1836.

event.title: is known well in the area for its duck hunting and fishing industries, and in the past

data.event: It is known well in the area for its duck hunting and fishing industries, and in the past, was recognized for sorghum production, although it is no longer produced there.
Benton County was formed in 1835 from part of Humphreys County.
